/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a verdant canopy over the road. Cars of various colors are parked neatly on the side of the road, adding a splash of vibrancy to the scene. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye down the length of the street. The colors in the image are muted, with the green of the trees contrasting against the gray of the overcast sky and the various colors of the cars. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the city's blend of nature and urban development.
